name: 羅元隆
objective: 本課程首先介紹鋼筋混凝土材料及其力學性質，並解釋鋼筋混凝土構材受到軸向力、彎曲力矩、剪力、扭轉力矩及握裹力作用時之行為與設計理論。並依據現行之鋼筋混凝土設計規範進行結構安全設計練習。This course firstly introduces the properties of concrete materials and their mechanic behaviors. And then the failure states of the reinforced concrete components under various loadings are introduced, such as axial force, bending moment, shear force, and torque. Finally, the current design code of reinforced concrete components is introduced and practiced with questions.
